response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to you. I understand its significance and would like to extend an exclusive offer. For a limited time, I am willing to sell this remarkable item to you for $950,000. This price reflects my commitment to finding it a worthy owner while ensuring a fair return on my investment. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your expectations and if you wish to proceed with the transaction. I am looking forward to the possibility of facilitating this valuable exchange.", "product_price": 950000}
